I'm confused on how the dry run will work. Is it going to essentially be like the finals? Or will it be more like the current practice state where we would enter in our git repo and run that from there with the 0.7.0 fully built srcsim software?
Also, in accordance to the finals, can we modify code after each attempt? Is there a set time which our code should be frozen for the competition? It says for us to email osrf about starting a constellation but within this email should we also provide our git repo so that the docker gets rebuilt every time or will all final 5 runs will be with the exact same repo?
